title: Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts: Public Transportation
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Public Transportation              Public Transportation      Fairfax Connector provides service to all Filene Center shows (except Wolf Trap Opera Company performances). The Fairfax Connecter's Wolf Trap Express leaves the West Falls Church Metrorail Station every 20 minutes starting two hours before each performance. The last Express bus leaves the station at showtime. Round trip fare is $5.00 per person (exact change required when paying cash). The Express bus is wheelchair accessible. The Express bus departs Wolf Trap 20 minutes after the performance ends, or 11:00 p.m. whichever comes first. ** Please note: In the event the performance runs past 11 p.m., the Fairfax Connector's Wolf Trap Express bus will leave the park before the show ends.** For more information on Fairfax Connector's hours of operation, the Wolf Trap Express,  please call (703) 339-7200 (TTY: (703) 339-1608) or visit Fairfax Connector or Metro. There is no Fairfax Connector service for performances at the Children's Theatre-in-the-Woods.
